ns0:simpleDc.ns2:title: Basic Statistics for the polar ionosphere
ns0:simpleDc.ns2:subject: ionosphere statistics
electron temperature
ion temperature
elecron density
ion flux
polar

ns0:dcTerms.ns2:abstract: This table gives the mean values and standard deviations for basic ionospheric parameters (Te, Ti, Ne, and Flux) at altitudes ranging from 100Km-800Km over the Sondrestrum, Svalbard, and Tromso Incoherent Scatter Radars. All data was taken from times where radars were directed directly up the magnetic filed line.
